title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication System
summary: Implement a secure, compliant, and user-friendly multi-factor authentication process.
description: Design and build an authentication mechanism that ensures secure access to the portal using multiple verification factors such as password, OTP, or biometric authentication. Enforce encryption standards for data in transit and at rest, implement session timeout and device management, and ensure compliance with financial data protection regulations. Provide a smooth and intuitive experience without compromising system security.

title: Responsive User Interface and Personalized Dashboard
summary: Develop a device-responsive user interface with a personalized dashboard for banking services.
description: Design a modern and responsive portal interface that provides customers with an optimal viewing experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. Create a personalized dashboard that dynamically displays banking products, account summaries, and eligible offers based on customer profile and preferences. Ensure that the layout supports accessibility guidelines and maintains consistent usability throughout the portal.

title: Core Banking Integration and Database Synchronization
summary: Establish seamless integration with the bank’s core system and maintain an optimized local database.
description: Develop secure APIs and integration connectors to ensure real-time data exchange between the self-service portal and the core banking system. Implement an independent, optimized database for portal operations to improve performance and reliability. Ensure data synchronization consistency, handle latency gracefully, and monitor integration queues for error management and recovery.

title: Digital Account Opening and Service Request Workflow
summary: Provide seamless digital workflows for account openings and service modifications.
description: Build structured workflows that guide customers through the account opening and service modification processes. Create intelligent form handling with inline validations, smart data prefill, and the ability to save partially completed requests. Integrate workflow steps with backend systems to automate submission, review, and approval processes while minimizing manual interventions.

title: Document Upload and Management System
summary: Enable secure upload and management of mandatory documents through the portal.
description: Implement a document upload feature that allows users to attach required supporting files—such as identity or address proofs—directly through the portal interface. Ensure that uploaded files are encrypted, scanned for malware, validated for type and size, and stored in secure, compliant repositories. Provide a user-friendly interface for tracking uploaded documents and submitting missing ones when prompted.

title: Real-Time Status Tracking and Notification Framework
summary: Provide automated real-time updates and notifications about request progress.
description: Develop a background event-driven system to track every user request and provide real-time status updates on the dashboard. Implement automated notifications sent through email or SMS whenever application states change. Incorporate configurable notification templates and ensure reliability with retry mechanisms for failed deliveries.

title: User Interaction History and Activity Logging
summary: Track and display all customer activities within the self-service portal.
description: Create a comprehensive logging framework to record all user interactions, submitted requests, and system events. Provide a user-facing module where customers can view their interaction and request history, filter by date, status, or request type, and download summaries. Implement secure audit trails to support regulatory and compliance requirements while maintaining performance and scalability.

title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) System
summary: Implement role-based access and permissions according to profile and authorization level.
description: Develop a configurable RBAC system that enforces differentiated access for customers, administrators, and banking staff. Define user roles, associated permissions, and assign privilege levels to limit viewing or modifying sensitive data. Integrate with identity management solutions to ensure consistent entitlement mapping and enforce the principle of least privilege across all modules.

title: Data Security, Privacy, and Compliance Layer
summary: Implement advanced data protection measures and compliance monitoring.
description: Establish data encryption policies, access control mechanisms, and compliance procedures to safeguard customer financial information. Include automated compliance checks for regulatory frameworks such as GDPR and data retention laws. Ensure continuous monitoring, vulnerability assessments, and incident response workflows to maintain high trust levels and platform integrity.
